bibl.note: DaktulioyÆkh. - Olympian banquets. - Marine goddesses. - Historic collections and imperial sex. - Kings' gems: Time stones and trophies. - Chimaera. - Philosopher's stones. - The sociology of trufÆ. - Gemmed words. - Coda. <daktuliotheke, truphe>
